English: Hailar district, Mongolian Xailar raion, of Hulunbuir city `呼~`倫~`貝~`爾~`市~|`呼~伦贝尔`市~[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia

d.f: `城市~`名~。`興安省~`省會~，`位於~`海拉爾河~`上游~，`有~`中長鐵路~`經過~，`畜產~`貿易~`發達~，`靠近~`俄~`境~，`是~`邊防~`要地~。

English: Hailar district, Mongolian Xailar raion, of Hulunbuir city `呼~`倫~`貝~`爾~`市~|`呼~伦贝尔`市~[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia
